name: modal annihilation
description: lays waste to those evil modal dialogs / nags that try to block your view of a site if you don't sign up. works on Pinterest, Facebook, Boxed, thredUP, and Goldstar. submit pull requests for other sites to help me defeat evil modals across the web!

additional_info: 1st screenshot is Pinterest before this style is applied. you will need to disable this style in order to log in to Pinterest. please submit any issues or suggestions to the GitHub repo. changelog: 2018-12-24: add HackerRank 2017-01-25: add Facebook, update for changes in Pinterest code 2016-06-14: add Goldstar 2016-06-09: fix for some legitimate Pinterest functions being hidden because they use modals. now we only hide them when you're not logged in. 2016-04-15: add Pinterest and Boxed, rename to "modal annihilation" 2016-01-29: initial release of "thredUP: hide modal dialog"
